isis.stitle: 13 SPEED AND 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-713/18 SERIES - INSTALL - MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY

note.para: The lower countershaft bearings and the input shaft must be installed, but for higher torque ratings, do not install the front bearing cover.
Check to make sure lower countershaft drive gear marked tooth is in time with main drive gear set of marked teeth.

step1.para: Block the upper countershaft forward against the case wall ( Figure 226).

With reverse gear forward against the next speed gear and mainshaft pilot end over the integral oil pump gear, lower the mainshaft assembly while pulling shaft rear through the case bore ( Figure 226).
Pull the input shaft forward until the drive gear is against the case ( Figure 227).
After the mainshaft drops into the case, slide the countershaft back and the mainshaft should fall down between the countershafts ( Figure 227).
Move the mainshaft pilot end into the input shaft pilot bushing ( Figure 227). Mesh the mainshaft gears with the corresponding countershaft assembly gears.
Position the upper reverse idler gear in the case ( Figure 228).

figure.caption: Figure 228. Position Upper Reverse Idler Gear in Case

step1.para: Mesh the reverse gear teeth with the reverse idler gear teeth and move the reverse gear to the rear as far as possible ( Figure 228).
Align the reverse gear spacer external splines with the reverse gear and move spacer into reverse gear ( Figure 229).

figure.caption: Figure 229. Install Reverse Gear I.D. Snap Ring

step1.para: Install the reverse gear I.D. snap ring and move the reverse gear forward on the mainshaft and against the reverse gear limit washer ( Figure 229).
To finish the input shaft/front bearing cover installation, refer to INSTALL, INPUT SHAFT .
